Cyclist Magazine Podcast episode 84: Greg LeMond, winner of the greatest ever Tour de France

This week on the Cyclist Magazine Podcast, James is joined by Cyclist‘s very own editor (and his boss), Pete Muir, to interview cycling legend Greg LeMond, who’s back for his second appearance on the podcast.

LeMond is a great storyteller, so this is a long episode, but trust us it’s worth the time to hear Greg talk candidly about getting shot and nearly dying, losing contracts, not getting paid, winning it all anyway, then finding himself embroiled in cycling’s most sordid era. Get the kettle on and settle in.

Our chat begins at 7m37s.
